questions.text: What do you think about the use of dummies?
options: I don't mind them but never used much.
I preferred to not use the dummy as much as possible.
I would never use a dummy.

questions.text: Can you tell us why you have this view?
At what age do you think it is appropriate for a child to have a dummy?
How do you feel about children of 4yrs+ using dummies?
